DescriptionData.Title: First Faces - By Snazaroo
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo has compiled its first book of face painting designs, suitably titled "First Faces." This amazing book contains step-by-step face painting instructions and helpful hints on basic techniques for beginners. "First Faces" includes 25 face designs and many ideas for face painting hands, arms, legs and toes, plus a small gallery of cheek, hand and arm tattoos. 32 page photo paperback book.
Snazaroo First faces includes chapters on Crazy Clowns, Animal Magic, Mighty Monsters, Snow Queen, In the Garden, Dangerous Dinos, Save the World, Simply Scenes, Hands Up!, Legging It!, Oodles of Doodles, Doodles Galore, and Finishing Touches.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: 32 pages of over 25 basic face painting designs
Colorful gallery of cheek, arm, hand, tattoos
